Create.DuplicateUserWarning: 请注意，禁止为了提升评分而创建多个账户，并将导致账户被封禁。 如果您忘记了您的密码，请重设或联系工作人员。
Create.EmailIsRequired: 电子邮箱地址不能为空。
Create.EmailNote: 其他用户不会看到您的电子邮件地址。请确保您输入的地址是有效的。忘记密码时需要通过该邮件地址找回。要添加用户头像，您需要将您的电子邮件地址与Gravatar绑定。电子邮件地址可以在日后更换。
Create.EmailTaken: 此电子邮箱地址已被使用。如果这是你的地址，请使用重置密码功能，如果这不起作用，请联系支持。
Create.TwitterNote: 或者你可以使用Twitter账号登录。Twitter账号也可以随后链接。
Create.UsernameNote: 用户名必须至少3个字符，只能包含英文字母、数字和下划线。密码必须至少{{0}}个字符。

Details.ConfirmDisable: 您确定您想要禁用这个用户吗？
Details.KnownLanguagesMessage: Please let us know which languages you are familiar with. You can enter this information under "My settings", "Profile", "Languages I know". We can use this information to determine how to contact you when needed.
Details.PossibleProducerMessage: Are you possibly an artist (such as producer, animator or illustrator) working with Vocaloid/UTAU? If so, please see the artist verification page.
Details.VisibleOnlyToMe: Visible only to me and staff.

ForgotPassword.EmailIsRequired: 电子邮箱地址为必填项
ForgotPassword.MessageSent: If the provided information matches our records, you should receive email shortly. If not, check that the username and email match, and that the account is not disabled. If the email still doesn't arrive, contact a moderator.
ForgotPassword.UsernameDoesNotMatch: 用户名与电子邮箱地址不匹配。

LoginUsingAuth.AlmostDone: Almost done! You need to choose a username for VocaDB.
LoginUsingAuth.AuthError: Sorry - unable to process authentication. Please verify that cookies are enabled and try again.

Messages.ClickSubjectToView: Click subject to view the message.
Messages.MessageSendError: 在发送信息时出现错误。
Messages.Subject: 标题

MySettings.AccessKeyDescription:
Access key can be used to log in to your VocaDB account from various other services without revealing your actual password.
				You can regenerate your access key at any time - this will invalidate the previous access key.
				Keep your access key secret! If you suspect your access key has been discovered by someone else, please reset it immediately.
MySettings.AnonymousActivity: 允许我的用户名显示在最近的活动列表中。
MySettings.ChangePasswordNotice: 如果您想要更改您的密码，您只需要填写这些信息。
MySettings.EmailNote: 对其他用户不可见，用于Gravatar与密码重置。
MySettings.EmailTaken: 此电子邮箱地址属于另一个用户。如果这是你的地址，请联系支持。
MySettings.InvalidEmail: 请检查电子邮箱地址的格式。
MySettings.PasswordsMustMatch: 两次输入的密码必须一致
MySettings.PublicAlbumCollection: 允许其他人查看我拥有的专辑。
MySettings.PublicRatings: 允许其他人看到我的歌曲与专辑评分。
MySettings.UnableToSave: 无法保存设置。请更正错误并重试。

RequestVerification.ArtistTitle: 您申请核实的条目名称：（必填）
RequestVerification.NoPrivateMessage: 下方所填地址即证明材料
RequestVerification.NotLoggedInMessage: 抱歉，你只有在<1>登录</1>或<2>注册</2>后才能进行此操作。
RequestVerification.PrivateMessage: 证明材料将通过私信提交至管理员
RequestVerification.URL: 证明材料地址，如一条说明“VocaDb某目是我本人”的微博：（必填）
